emp_tab.name: Name
emp_tab.inst_1: Download the given format and fill all the columns marked in red color.
emp_tab.inst_2: Date should be in the format of mm/dd/yyyy.
emp_tab.inst_3: Action type New Entry Will only register the employee who is not already registred and this will not update existing.
emp_tab.inst_4: Action type Update Existing will only update the employees already registered and this is will not make a new registration.
emp_tab.inst_5: Action Type Both will register the employee if he/she is not already registered and if already register it will update the details.
